casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Stuart A. SCHLESINGER. No. D-2877. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 29, 2016.

Stuart A. Schlesinger, of New York, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
